summary.span: 在 控件中显示一个列标题。

span.span: Displays a single column header in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列标题是 包含标题文本的控件中的项。A column header is an item in a control that contains heading text. 可以使用类的方法将对象添加到 。 objects can be added to a using the method of the class. 若要向添加一组列 ，可以使用 类的方法 。To add a group of columns to a , you can use the method of the class. 您可以使用 类的属性 来确定在中的位置 。You can use the property of the class to determine where the is located in the . 提供 和 属性，以设置在控件中显示的文本以及列标头中文本的对齐方式。 provides the and properties to set the text displayed in the control and the alignment of the text in the column header. 若要确定是否 与 控件关联，可以引用 属性。To determine whether a is associated with a control, you can reference the property. 如果要复制 以便在其他控件中使用 ，可以使用 方法。If you want to copy a for use in another control, you can use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化 控件。The following code example demonstrates initializing a control. 该示例创建 对象并设置列标题的 、 和 属性。The example creates objects and sets the column header's , and properties. 该示例还向添加了项和子项 。The example also adds items and subitems to the . 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体中，并 `PopulateListView` 从窗体的构造函数或 事件处理程序调用方法。To run this example paste the following code in a form and call the `PopulateListView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有在构造了和后，调用方法才有效 ，并使用项填充列。Calling the method is only effective once the and containing have been constructed, and the column is populated with items. 如果将新项添加到 ，则除非再次调用，否则列将不会调整大小 。If new items are added to the , the column will not resize unless is called again.

summary.span: 处置由 占用的资源（内存除外）。

span.span: Disposes of the resources (other than memory) used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用后 ，必须释放对的所有引用， 以使其占用的内存可通过垃圾回收进行回收。After calling , you must release all references to the so the memory it was occupying can be reclaimed by garbage collection. > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收 调用 对象的析构函数之前，将不会释放正在使用的资源。Otherwise, the resources the is using will not be freed until garbage collection calls the object's destructor.

summary.span: 获取或设置显示在 中的图像的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the image displayed in the .

value.span: 显示在 中的图像的索引。

span.span: The index of the image displayed in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性引用由包含的的属性指定的图像的索引 。The property refers to the index of an image specified by the property of the that contains the . 如果未 在包含的上设置，则属性将返回-1 。The property returns -1 if there is no set on the containing . 列中显示的图像通常用于指示列中项的状态。The image displayed in a column is typically used to indicate the state of items in the column. 和 是互斥的，也就是说，如果设置了一个，则将另一个设置为无效值并将其忽略。 and are mutually exclusive, meaning if one is set, the other is set to an invalid value and ignored. 如果设置了 属性，则 属性会自动设置为-1。If you set the property, the property is automatically set to -1. 或者，如果设置了 属性，则会 自动将设置为空字符串 ( "" ) 。Alternatively, if you set the property, the is automatically set to an empty string (""). 如果 属性值更改为 `null` ，则 属性返回其默认值-1。If the property value is changed to `null`, the property returns its default value, -1. 但是，分配的 值在内部保留，并在另一个 对象分配给属性时使用 。However, the assigned value is retained internally and used when another object is assigned to the property. 如果分配给 该属性的新的 属性值小于或等于赋给属性的值 减一 (以将集合作为从零开始的索引) ，则该 属性值将调整为小于 属性值的值。If the new assigned to the property has an property value that is less than or equal to the value assigned to the property minus one (to account for the collection being a zero-based index), the property value is adjusted to one less than the property value. 例如，请考虑一个按钮控件，其 包含三个图像，其 属性设置为2。For example, consider a button control whose has three images and whose property is set to 2. 如果为该 按钮分配了只包含两个图像的新，则 该值将更改为1。If a new that has only two images is assigned to the button, the value changes to 1.

span.span: is less than -1.

value.span: 显示在列中的图像的键。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 属性是互斥的，也就是说，如果设置了一个，则其他属性将被设置为无效值并被忽略。The and properties are mutually exclusive, meaning if one is set, the other is set to an invalid value and ignored. 如果设置了 属性，则 属性会自动设置为-1。If you set the property, the property is automatically set to -1. 或者，如果设置了 属性，则会 自动将设置为空字符串 ( "" ) 。Alternatively, if you set the property, the is automatically set to an empty string (""). 与关联的图像 通常用于指示状态信息。The image associated with a is typically used to indicate the state information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值不一定对应于中列标题的当前可视位置 。The value of this property does not necessarily correspond to the current visual position of the column header within the . 这可能是因为当 属性设置为) 时，用户 (在运行时对列标题重新排序 `true` 。This can be due to the user reordering the column headers at run time (when the property is set to `true`). 如果没有 包含在控件中，则 此属性返回的值为-1。If the is not contained within a control this property returns a value of -1.

summary.span: 获取或设置 中所显示文本的水平对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of the text displayed in the .
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此属性为每个中显示的文本提供不同的文本对齐方式设置 。You can use this property to provide different text alignment settings for the text displayed in each . > [!NOTE] > 由于基础控件中的限制，此属性对控件中的第一列不起作用 ，这始终靠左对齐。Due to a limitation in the underlying control, this property has no effect on the first column in the control, which is always aligned to the left. 若要在中解决此限制 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] ，你可以处理 事件并自己绘制列标题。To work around this limitation in [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], you can handle the event and paint the column header yourself. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化 控件。The following code example demonstrates initializing a control. 该示例创建 对象并设置列标题的 、 和 属性。The example creates objects and sets the column header's , and properties. 该示例还向添加了项和子项 。The example also adds items and subitems to the . 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体中，并 `PopulateListView` 从窗体的构造函数或 事件处理程序调用方法。To run this example paste the following code in a form and call the `PopulateListView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置列的宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets the width of the column.

value.span: 列的宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The width of the column, in pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使你能够设置 的 。This property enables you to set the of the . 可以设置在运行时调整为列内容或标题。The can be set to adjust at run time to the column contents or heading. 若要调整列中最大项的宽度，请将 属性设置为-1。To adjust the width of the longest item in the column, set the property to -1. 若要调整到列标题的宽度，请将 属性设置为-2。To autosize to the width of the column heading, set the property to -2. > [!NOTE] > 当所有列的组合宽度超过32768像素时，可能会产生意外行为。Unexpected behavior can result when the combined width of all columns exceeds 32,768 pixels. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化 控件。The following code example demonstrates initializing a control. 该示例创建 对象并设置列标题的 、 和 属性。The example creates objects and sets the column header's , and properties. 该示例还向添加了项和子项 。The example also adds items and subitems to the . 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体中，并 `PopulateListView` 从窗体的构造函数或 事件处理程序调用方法。To run this example paste the following code in a form and call the `PopulateListView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/VB/form1.vb#1)]
